title: statconvert
text: statconvert helpful formatting package allows user easily convert output statistical test copy paste-able string. Converting tabular output statistical function academic article can often tedious task package streamlines considerably. Test results reported according APA’s standards

title: statconvert
text: package contains one namesake function. statconvert series statements checking class object given . function determines type test object received, calls specific helper function designed handle test returns string can just copy paste word processor. example wanted convert output oneway ANOVA test use statconvert function like
code: data(mtcars) md <- aov(mpg ~ wt, data = mtcars) statconvert(md) #> An analysis of variance showed that the effect of wt was significant, F(1, 30) = 91.38, p < 0.001.
